description: Ministry of Labour - Revocation of Order published in Gaz. Ex. No. 1597/7 of 27.04.2009 - Appointed Mr. P. Weerasekara as an Arbitrator to settle the dispute between Inter Company Employees' Union and Daintee Foods Ltd. - Appointed Mr. P. Weerasekera and an arbitrator to settle the dispute between Mr. J. M. M. S. Jayasundara and Peoples' Bank
